response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, we are confident it would be an excellent addition to your collection or operations. We understand its immense worth to you stands at $1,500,000. Considering this, we propose to offer it to you at a price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant opportunity to acquire such a valuable asset at a highly favorable rate. We hope to hear your positive response soon. If you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. Thank you for considering our product.", "product_price": 1200000}
